title: N-Repeated Element in Size 2N Array - Hash Table - Easy - LeetCode
content:
In an array A of size 2N, there are N+1 unique elements, and exactly one of these elements is repeated N times.

Return the element repeated N times.

 

Example 1:

Input: [1,2,3,3]
Output: 3
Example 2:

Input: [2,1,2,5,3,2]
Output: 2
Example 3:

Input: [5,1,5,2,5,3,5,4]
Output: 5
 

Note:

4 <= A.length <= 10000
0 <= A[i] < 10000
A.length is even

public class Solution {
    public int RepeatedNTimes(int[] A) {
        var set = new HashSet<int>();
        for(int i=0;i<A.Length;i++){
            if(set.Contains(A[i])){
                return A[i];
            }
            set.Add(A[i]);
        }
        return -1;
    }
}

Time Complexity: O(n)

Space Complexity: O(n)

recommendations.title: Minimum Distance Between BST Nodes - Tree - Easy - LeetCode
recommendations.content:
Given a Binary Search Tree (BST) with the root node root, return the minimum difference between the values of any two different nodes in the tree. Example : Input: root = [4,2,6,1,3,null,null]
Output: 1
